# Draft:Crisis in Republic of Srpska 2025

Crisis in Republic of Srpska begun on August 6 after Court of Bosnia and Bosnia and Herzegovina removed Milorad Dodik from president of Republic of Srpska. Viktor Orban and Dodik refuesed to regonize the court's desicion, while Dragan Čović and Croatia regonized it. Since then Republic of Srpska de facto works apart the test od Bosnia and Herzegovina. Even before the crisis started Bosnia and Herzegovina was de facto splited on two parts: Republic of Srpska and Federation od Bosnia and Herzegovina because Dodik refuesed to regonize Christian Schmidt's decesions. Russia has condemed the removal along with Hungary.
